catty.command.help.desc: Show help page about commands in {0}.
catty.command.join.desc: Join to voice channel where user currently in or specified.
catty.command.leave.desc: Make {0} leave the voice channel currently in.
catty.command.say.desc: Speak text you typed in on the voice channel.
catty.command.settings.desc: Get or set settings of {0}. (some will reset on voice channel leave)
catty.help.message.dm_failed: :book: Failed to send **DM** to {0}. Did you **disable** it?
catty.help.message.main.line1: :information_source: This bot provides **Chat TTS** and **Music Bot** service.
catty.help.message.main.line3: :information_source: You can look into detailed help by `{0}{1} {2}` command.
catty.help.message.detail.line1: :information_source: This is a **Detailed Help Page** for {0}.
catty.info.message.line2: :scroll: This application follows GNU General Public License 2.0.
catty.settings.error.unknown_item: :wrench: :no_entry_sign: The item name you typed is **unknown**. Please check if you typed **correctly**.
catty.settings.message.line2: :warning: Some settings will **reset** when the bot leaves the voice channel..
discord.error.specify_or_join_channel: :loud_sound: :grey_question:Please **join** voice channel first or **specify** to argument.
discord.error.unknown_command: :information_source: :no_entry_sign: **Unknown** command. Please check if you typed **correctly**.
